select s.session_id, s.client_id, u.real_name, timestampdiff(second, s.start_time, s.end_time) as duration, s.start_time, s.rating from sessions s left outer join users u on s.client_id = u.user_id where s.status = 'closed'
and u.real_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and date(start_time) = #{date}
order by start_time desc
